name: Zadar
description:
Zadar is a 2D game with tanks. You fight in a 3v3 battles on various maps and with various tanks.

Zadar is also a WW2 styled game. Although it is in a fictional war which never happened.

ALSO, This game is meant to be played on a resolution of 1980x1080 or higher. So if you have a lower resolution you may experience bugs on the menus

ALL MISSIONS in the game are completely fictional and have no relation with real life. The only mission which is ment to reffrence real life is the mission "Battle For Berlin". But that mission also has a lot of elements which are completely fictional.
